Articles.Content: I think that just seeing a dev post (or a video) that has nate simpson saying that he understands how misleading he has been and talking about how the game is considerably worse the ksp 1 will help relations with the community.

Like those?

Yeah no, this will do nothing at all, the same as those excuses above did nothing at all.

Some of those games turned things around.

They did it by fixing what was broken. Anything they said or didn’t say made very little difference in either direction.

KSP2 will stand or fall on its merits. If it becomes the fun, engaging, rich, and enjoyable game it promises to be, all this will be forgotten — or celebrated as another great redemption arc!
